fields.label: Use Main Nav
fields.name: use_main_nav
fields.instructions: Use the site's main nav instead of the infographic nav.

fields.label: Logo
fields.name: logo
fields.instructions: Displayed next to the Opus logo.

fields.label: Background Image
fields.name: background_image
fields.instructions: Used for the entire page. Slides parallax over altering the look through color overlays.

fields.label: CTA Link
fields.name: cta_link
fields.instructions: Can be external, but to make it scroll to the form at the bottom, make this "#infographic-form" and the smooth scroll is taken care of.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Displayed in the Section Intro and at the top of each Slide.

sub_fields.label: Skip Numbering
sub_fields.name: skip_numbering
sub_fields.instructions: Skips the numbering on this section. Still receives one in the backend for dot navigation purposes.

sub_fields.label: Style
sub_fields.name: section_style
sub_fields.instructions: Determines the color overlay that scrolls over the background, backgrounds of slides, etc.

sub_fields.label: Oval Position
sub_fields.name: section_oval_position
sub_fields.instructions: Determines the position of the oval on the Section Intro.

sub_fields.label: Layout
sub_fields.name: slide_layout
sub_fields.instructions: Whether this slide has text & graphics or only centered text.

sub_fields.label: Transparent?
sub_fields.name: slide_transparent
sub_fields.instructions: Check if the slide should have a transparent background.

sub_fields.label: Top Text
sub_fields.name: slide_top_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text above the larger number text. e.g. "At least"

sub_fields.label: Top Text Animation
sub_fields.name: slide_top_text_animation
sub_fields.instructions: Animation used when this scrolls into view.

sub_fields.label: Large Text
sub_fields.name: slide_large_text
sub_fields.instructions: Large text meant for numbers or short words. e.g. "56<sup%</sup>"

sub_fields.label: Large Text (smaller)
sub_fields.name: slide_large_text_smaller
sub_fields.instructions: Makes the large text smaller than usual. Check if using words rather than numbers.

sub_fields.label: Large Text Animation
sub_fields.name: slide_large_text_animation
sub_fields.instructions: Animation used when this scrolls into view.

sub_fields.label: Under Text
sub_fields.name: slide_under_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text below the larger number text. e.g. "More"

sub_fields.label: Under Text Animation
sub_fields.name: slide_under_text_animation
sub_fields.instructions: Animation used when this scrolls into view.

sub_fields.label: Small Text
sub_fields.name: slide_small_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text below the larger number and under text. e.g. "of companies experienced a third party data breach in the last year"

sub_fields.label: Small Text Animation
sub_fields.name: slide_small_text_animation
sub_fields.instructions: Animation used when this scrolls into view.

sub_fields.label: Graphic Animation
sub_fields.name: slide_graphic_animation
sub_fields.instructions: Animation used when this scrolls into view.

sub_fields.label: Graphic Offset
sub_fields.name: slide_graphic_offset
sub_fields.instructions: A negative or positive vertical margin (px) for the graphic. Use this if you want to make the graphic "hang" off of the box behind it.

sub_fields.label: Upper Centered Text
sub_fields.name: slide_upper_centered_text
sub_fields.instructions: The line above the large centered text.

sub_fields.label: Upper Centered Text Animation
sub_fields.name: slide_upper_centered_text_animation
sub_fields.instructions: Animation used when this scrolls into view.

sub_fields.label: Large Centered Text
sub_fields.name: slide_large_centered_text
sub_fields.instructions: The middle large centered text.

sub_fields.label: Large Centered Text Animation
sub_fields.name: slide_large_centered_text_animation
sub_fields.instructions: Animation used when this scrolls into view.

sub_fields.label: Lower Centered Text
sub_fields.name: slide_lower_centered_text
sub_fields.instructions: The line below the large centered text.

sub_fields.label: Lower Centered Text Animation
sub_fields.name: slide_lower_centered_text_animation
sub_fields.instructions: Animation used when this scrolls into view.

fields.label: Form Embed Code
fields.name: form_embed_code
fields.instructions: This will override the Form option if a form embed code is entered.
